import React from "react"; import Header from "../Components/Header"; import Footer from "../Components/Footer"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem, } from "react-bootstrap"; import Rating from "../Components/Rating"; import products from "../products"; import Product from "../Components/Product"; const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const product = products.find((p) => p._id === match.params.id); return ( <> go back

{product.name}

 price:${product.price} Description:${product.description} Price ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? "In stock " : "Out Of Stock"} ); }; export default ProductScreen;
